CustomField.formula: IF(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "EBH_SubCampaign",RecordType.DeveloperName =="EBH_AMOutreach"), NumberOfResponses , IF(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "EBH_Campaign", RecordType.DeveloperName = "EBH_CampaignProgramme"), HierarchyNumberOfResponses , null) )
CustomField.label: Reached Contacts
